name: Long Live Freedom
description:
A Global Game Jam game made by Miko Sramek over the course of 48 hours.

In this game take on the role of a propaganda poster making dictator! Monitor what's best for your country and create the appropriate poster for that day. Control Fear and Distrust of other as well as Patriotism within your country using the appropriate imagery.

There's currently no win/loss state, but try your best to keep all levels as high as possible. Use the phone to bring up a menu.
